content:
**crochet flower slippers in drops alpaca for baby and children size 1 month to 4 years ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see little miss berry cardigan pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** 1/3 -6/9 12/18 month 2 -3/4 years
to fit foot length 10-11-12 14-15 cm **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio
shoes
50-50-50 50-50 g colour no 3720 old rose + a remainder of 7300 lime and 3140 light rose for flowers and edge drops crochet hook no 3
drops light wooden button no 503 2 pcs **pattern links ** french version 2 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/b14-5-little-miss-berry-cardigan 2 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b14&d_id=8
